DOC.brief_summary: This phase I , open-label , randomize study healthy adult . Eligible subject give single dose either Dry Powdered Measles Vaccine ( PMV ) Puffhaler® device , Dry PMV SoloventTM device license measles vaccine subcutaneous route ( SMV ) . Subjects follow 180 day safety .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial Assess Safety Measles Vaccine ( Dry Powder ) Administered Two Different Devices
DOC.detailed_description: This phase I , open-label , randomize study healthy adult . Eligible subject give single dose either Dry Powdered Measles Vaccine ( PMV ) Puffhaler® device , Dry PMV SoloventTM device license measles vaccine subcutaneous route ( SMV ) . Solicited reaction assess first 14 day vaccination unsolicited adverse event assess till 84 day vaccination . Subjects follow 180 day SAEs .
DOC.criteria: Male adult age 1845 year . Measles immune , determine IgG antibody level . Healthy support medical history , physical examination laboratory evaluation preset parameter . Signed informed consent participation trial HIV screening . Medical history immunodeficiency/suppression subject history close contact immunocompromised/ immunosuppressed person .
